game.s_dis: Vex 3 is a fast-paced 2D platformer where players run, jump, and slide to dodge hazardous obstacles through ten new areas and nine challenge modes.
game.l_dis:
Vex 3 – Dash, Jump & Slide Through Obstacles

Vex 3 is the thrilling third installment in the Vex series, a 2D platformer that tests precision, timing, and reflexes as players navigate dangerous levels filled with traps and obstacles.

What is Vex 3?

In Vex 3, players traverse ten new areas, overcome perilous obstacles, and tackle nine unique challenge modes. Quick reflexes and careful planning are key to surviving each level.

How to Play Vex 3?

  • Run & Jump: Use arrow keys or WASD to move, jump, and slide through levels.
  • Slide & Dodge: Avoid spikes, saws, and other traps by sliding under or leaping over them.
  • Challenge Modes: Test your skills in different modes with specific goals and constraints.
  • Precision Timing: Each obstacle requires careful timing to survive.
  • Explore New Areas: Ten brand new levels filled with surprises and hazards await.

Why Play Vex 3 Unblocked?

Vex 3 Unblocked allows you to enjoy the fast-paced platforming action anywhere, directly in your browser without restrictions.

Key Features

  • Fast-Paced Platforming: Quick reflexes are essential to navigate obstacles.
  • Multiple Challenge Modes: Nine modes add variety and difficulty.
  • New Levels: Ten fresh areas to explore with escalating hazards.
  • Precision-Based Gameplay: Timing and skill are critical for success.
  • Unblocked Access: Play instantly online without restrictions.

Are You Vex Enough? ⚡

Dash, jump, and slide through increasingly difficult obstacles in Vex 3—can you master all levels and challenges?
